Parameters: String: the identifier of the utterance.
onUtteranceCompleted(java.lang.String).Description: Called when an utterance has been synthesized.
onUtteranceCompleted(java.lang.String).history: Added in API level 4 Deprecated in API level 18

ClassDesc: Use @B_android#speech#tts#UtteranceProgressListener_E@ instead. Listener that will be called when the TTS service has completed synthesizing an utterance. This is only called if the utterance has an utterance ID (see @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#Engine#KEY_PARAM_UTTERANCE_ID_E@).
